"{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":80410,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/913f170e-ab54-46db-b55c-77d972e86786/2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/913f170e-ab54-46db-b55c-77d972e86786/2.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"2.png\",\"name\":\"2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"913f170e-ab54-46db-b55c-77d972e86786\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":975,\"height\":275},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Below is an excerpt from an interview with\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Uladzimir_Sukhan\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vladimir Sukhan\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"- Founder of the Department.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e9c1fa3d-cbec-49f8-aa8b-874576143b9c/image2020-1-13_13-58-2.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":495,\"height\":335},\"align\":\"align-center\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Beginning of TAD\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the end of 2009, the Director of EPAM BY proposed that I take over the Parallels project. The main goal was to increase the ramp-up project team from 0 to 20 specialists in 2-3 months.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The majority of our first team mastered new technologies and showed excellent results in a very short time. The Parallels project challenge was solved successfully!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When was TAD1 founded?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We evolved by evolving. At first, some of our teams called themselves using the letters of the Greek alphabet: alpha-team, betta-team, gamma-team. After rebranding, they were called fruit or berry names, and then, in 2012, TAD1 was founded. At the same time, the big Solutions Group team of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Mikhail_Subach?tab=skills\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mikhail Subach\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" joined us. We had about 100 automation testers in total by 2012.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Having so many testers in the department opened up new opportunities: we started to shared technical solutions from different projects and regions on TechTalks. Those events, now known as TAD talks, had a big audience inside and outside the department. We also successfully held the first TAD Hackathon and participated in EPAM Hackathons with our team. Here we competed with mastodons in development and created, in fact, the first Selenium Grid in Cloud – a tool that would deploy environments and run tests.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"That’s also when we assembled a team to start the Report portal, with Dmitriy Gumeniuk as leader. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I felt that I am responsible for the growth of the automation practice at EPAM. That’s why, in 2010, we opened the LAB for automation testers and did a full reboot with the help of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Vitali_Shulha?tab=profile\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vitali Shulha\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in 2012. Since then, we have grown to 200 specialists in the department.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Then was the stage of new accelerators: Cloud-orchestrators like Selenoid and recipe initiatives. The second of our big products was Mobile Cloud, headed by \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Andrei_Petrashkevich?tab=profile\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Andrei Petrashkevich\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Practice development process and role continuity\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In 2019, we changed roles and functions in the company. I became a part of DTSO practices and work with business issues, and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Ihar_Bylitski?tab=profile\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ihar Bylitski\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" has continued his work with talents. This is part of the evolution and maturation of the company. At EPAM, there is the opportunity to try yourself in something new if you are tired of your current routine. This is an indisputable plus.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
